 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְפַרְדֵּעַ‎</span> **noun feminine**<sup>[[Exod.8.2|Exod 8:2]]</sup> (compare also [[BDB#Albr.|Albr]]<sup>ZAW xv (1895), 322</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:135o»§§ 135o</sup> «GKC:145o»145o) ==frogs== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, etc.; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עוּדְּעָנַיָּא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוּרְדְּעָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — ***frogs***, collective [[Exod.8.2|Exod 8:2]]; [[Ps.78.45|Ps 78:45]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִפַרְדְּעִים‎</span> [[Exod.7.27|Exod 7:27]]; [[Exod.7.28|Exod 7:28]]; [[Exod.7.29|Exod 7:29]]; [[Exod.8.1|Exod 8:1]]; [[Exod.8.3|Exod 8:3]]; [[Exod.8.4|Exod 8:4]]; [[Exod.8.5|Exod 8:5]]; [[Exod.8.7|Exod 8:7]]; [[Exod.8.8|Exod 8:8]]; [[Exod.8.9|Exod 8:9]]; [[Ps.105.30|Ps 105:30]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶ֫פֶת‎</span> see II <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צפה‎</span>.
